doc.title: Usage
doc.content:
# Usage
  
 <term term="th2-infra-operator">th2-infra-operator</term> (component responsible for creating boxes) automatically adds special MQ <term term="pin">pin</term> for receiving events to **estore** by any other component.  

At the same time, any box with <term term="Custom resource">CR</term> kind `Th2Box` will get special MQ <term term="pin">pin</term> for sending events to the **estore**. These <term term="pin">pins</term>  have attributes `event` and `publish`.

terms.title: th2-infra-operator
terms.content: th2-infra-operator monitors the kubernetes cluster for changes and brings them to custom resources.

terms.title: pin
terms.content:
used by a box to connect th2 microservices between each other to send/receive messages, or to execute gRPC commands.

terms.title: Custom resource
terms.content:
Custom resources are extensions of the Kubernetes API. It is not necessarily available in a default Kubernetes installation. It represents a customization of a particular Kubernetes installation. However, many core Kubernetes functions are now built using CRs, making Kubernetes more modular.

You can find more information about Custom resources here.
